Incident ID: INC-1002
Title: Kubernetes CrashLoopBackOff in Order Service
Description: Order service pods repeatedly restarting after deployment v1.4.2.
Symptoms: CrashLoopBackOff, container exit code 137, OOMKilled.
Root Cause: Memory leak introduced in new release.
Resolution: Rolled back deployment to v1.4.1, increased memory limit from 512Mi to 1Gi.
Prevention: Add load testing before production release.
